page.title: 17PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: {PUBLIC HOUSES NEAR DUNSMORE There are only 4 public houses in this grid and all have been in existance for many years.{The Halfway House,}an old coaching inn on the A413, halfway from Amersham to Aylesbury, now caters for the passing motorist but also brought itself up_to_date with motel facilities. Once a week there is a jazz evening. Dunsmore has 2 pubs.{The {Fox}keeps the tradition of an English pub, serving bar snacks to the hikers, but the{Black Horse,}whilst keeping its licence, has become an up_market restaurant. Almost at the end of a no_ through road which has wound its way up the hill from the main road, and just beyond the cluster of cottages which is Little Hampden, is{The Rising {Sun.}It needs no publicity, as many patrons find their way there each day for lunches and evening meals.
